Posts.Content: Hi, I had the same thing three days after my surgery, everythingwas spinning even laying down, really un steady on my feet, my hubby rang doctor who gave me some tablets, not sure what they were sorry, but felt much better.  I would ring first thing in the morning if it is no better.  Hope it improves soon.  Best wishes x
Posts.Title: How long does it take to recover from anaesthetic?
